title: Stagestruck 3
creator_credit: Spellcaster Productions, TLC Films and Bob Harvey
brief_description: A compilation of 5 separate episodes, this is the final of a series of three videos on everything you would like to know about theatre production, and in particular, amateur theatre. Presented by Christina Barryk, aspects covered in this volume include: Stage manager’s tools of the trade, arranging of actors’ moves on stage, dress rehearsal hints and tips; Makeup techniques; Prop designing, casting and moulding; Technical rehearsal; Actors’ improvisation workshops, role-casting/role-playing, reality on stage; Costume design and making of costume, transforming actor into character. Final episode celebrates amateur dramatics, including the actors and the behind scenes technical crew. Also includes personal anecdotes interspersed thoughout the program.
